sourcesContent: import FavoriteIconDefault from '@mui/icons-material/FavoriteBorderOutlined' import FavoriteIcon from '@mui/icons-material/FavoriteOutlined' import { Box } from '@mui/material' import Rating from '../rating' function FooterBookCard(props) { return ( <> {props.authors.map((name, i) => {(i ? ', ' : '') + name} )} {props.title} ) } export default FooterBookCard
